name: 湛蓝星球-迷失的赛博之城
name_original: 湛蓝星球-迷失的赛博之城
description:
"Azure Plant - The Lost Cyber City" is a sublimation and expansion of classic city simulation games. The game not only makes the players experience the excitement and hardship of creating and maintaining a real city, but also introduces many characters to participate in the exploration of wilderness. The game adds a unique plot mechanism, so that players can experience the fun of solving puzzles and role playing while operating.



Harsh community rating:

Every year, the community you run will be graded. The higher the score, the richer the return. Work hard for the five-star community! At the same time, the score is also an important indicator of community upgrading, which is a test of players' ability to operate the community!



Magnificent architectural system:

Classic cyberstyle buildings, dazzling neon lights, players can freely place buildings in the specified area according to their own preferences, and build communities of different styles.



Rich street areas:

Put some designated buildings together to form a special street area and enjoy the building bonus, which not only helps the community score greatly, but also forms a characteristic landscape.



Building management:

A building that no one visited? It doesn't matter. Let's carry out business activities! It can attract more people to visit it. When the number of visitors meets the requirements, you can upgrade the building. After upgrading, the building will not only be more gorgeous, but also greatly enhance its functions!



Character cultivation:

The prosperous community will always attract all kinds of people. Players can choose NPC training, upgrade equipment, give props, and let them settle in your community, which will help you explore the wilderness!



Intimate store:

In order to make the players better cultivate characters, the store will launch some new products every quarter. Remember to buy!



Attractive events:

Like the store, a series of activities can be held every quarter to cultivate people and improve community rating more quickly!



Mysterious wilderness:

In order to obtain the special resources of the management community, players must enter the wasteland to explore and fight against the wasteland creatures. This is the time to show the character's personal charm. Each character has unique fighting skills. The higher the character's level, the more gorgeous the skill, and the stronger the character will help the player quickly knock down the monster to obtain resources.



Intriguing task:

In addition to operating the community, there will be other NPC from time to time to release some tasks to ask players to complete. There are many kinds of tasks. Of course, there will be great rewards for accomplishing them.



You decide the direction of the plot:

Does the fixed plot feel boring? We provide some choices to the players in the dialogue. Different choices will affect the trend of the follow-up plot. Different trends will lead to different endings. The two week project can unlock the new plot!
